original_text: So I, the Lord, tell you that I will call the nations in the north to come. I will call my servant, King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon, to come. I will bring them to attack this land and the people who live here. They will also attack all the nations that are around you. I will completely destroy this land, its people and all the nations around it. Their houses will become heaps of stones for ever. The land will become a terrible place. People will always see how foolish my people are.
korean_text: 보라 내가 북쪽 모든 종족과 내 종 바벨론의 왕 느부갓네살을 불러다가 이 땅과 그 주민과 사방 모든 나라를 쳐서 진멸하여 그들을 놀램과 비웃음 거리가 되게 하며 땅으로 영원한 폐허가 되게 할 것이라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: So I, the Lord, tell you
that I will call the nations in the north to come
King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon, to come
I will bring them to attack this land
and the people who live here
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여기에 사는 백성들을 공격하게 하리라

sentences.original_text: They will also attack all the nations that are around you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 또한 너희 주위의 모든 민족들을 공격할 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will completely destroy this land
its people and all the nations around it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 백성과 그 주위의 모든 민족들을 멸망시키리라

sentences.original_text: Their houses will become heaps of stones for ever
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 집들은 영원히 돌무더기가 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: The land will become a terrible place
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅은 끔찍한 곳이 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: People will always see how foolish my people are
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 항상 내 백성이 얼마나 어리석은지 보게 될 것이다
